name: FeedMe
description:
Deep down in the caves lives an entity. It desperately needs your help and you will be so kind to help it. Shoot and kill to collect resources for this hungry creature. Feed it and see what will happen.





Features

3D World

2D Animals, Enemies

Weapon Upgrade

Controls

W, A, S, D  - Movement

SHIFT - Sprint

E -  Interact

LEFT MOUSE - Shoot

ENTER - Dialog

R - Reload Weapon

Don't get too close to the Bätz!
